name: ikmb-eagleimp
title: IKMB-EagleImp
summary: EagleImp genotype imputation on the UKB RAP (dnanexus).

inputSpec.name: target
inputSpec.help: The target file to be imputed. The output file format will be the same as the input.

inputSpec.name: reference
inputSpec.help: UKBcomplete: complete panel with variants with at least MAC=4; UKBmaf: complete panel filtered by MAF=0.0001; 1000G: 1000 Genomes reference panel.

inputSpec.name: build
inputSpec.help: The genome build of the target file. Used to select the correct reference as imputation can only be conducted with target and reference in the same genome build.

inputSpec.name: allowRefAltSwap
inputSpec.help: Allow target and reference variants to match if their reference and alternative alleles are swapped.

inputSpec.name: allowStrandFlip
inputSpec.help: Allow target and reference variants to match if their reference and alternative alleles are strand flipped.

inputSpec.name: imputeR2filter
inputSpec.help: Output contains only variants with an estimated R2 greater or equal to this filter value.

inputSpec.name: imputeMAFfilter
inputSpec.help: Output contains only variants with a minor allele frequency greater or equal to this filter value.

inputSpec.name: imputeInfo
inputSpec.help:
Choose which probability information should accompany the hard called genotypes in the output:
a: allele dosages
g: genotype dosages
p: genotype probabilities
Can be arbitrarily combined.

inputSpec.name: K
inputSpec.help: K-best reference haplotypes are chosen for the phasing step prior to imputation.

inputSpec.name: maxChunkMemory
inputSpec.help: Max memory (in GiB) used for chunks. 0 = auto (85% of free RAM), any other value overrides the automatic setting. Be careful, the VM may crash if the setting is too high.

outputSpec.name: imputed_file
outputSpec.help: Contains the imputation result in .vcf.gz or .bcf format, depending on the target input.

outputSpec.name: phasing_confidences
outputSpec.help: Averaged phasing confidences per sample from the phasing step.

outputSpec.name: varinfo
outputSpec.help: Information on all variants from the reference whether it was included or excluded, and why.

outputSpec.name: log
outputSpec.help: Logfile containing terminal output including warnings and errors.
